languages.text: "Я прикажу починить твою внучку, но если желаешь вечно быть рядом с ней, ты тоже подвергнешься сервиторизации".

traits.locale_text: "Я прикажу починить твою внучку, но если желаешь вечно быть рядом с ней, ты тоже подвергнешься сервиторизации".

languages.text: "I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."
languages.original_text: "Я прикажу починить твою внучку, но если желаешь вечно быть рядом с ней, ты тоже подвергнешься сервиторизации".

traits.locale_text: "I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."
"I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."
"I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."
"I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."

languages.text: “我会下达命令，让他们把你的孙女修好。不过，如果你希望能永远和她在一起的话，我也会让你接受奴役仪典的改造。”
languages.original_text: "I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: “我会下达命令，让他们把你的孙女修好。不过，如果你希望能永远和她在一起的话，我也会让你接受奴役仪典的改造。”

languages.text: «Daré la orden de reparar a su nieta, pero, si quiere estar con ella para siempre, usted también tendrá que someterse a la Servidumbre Imperpituis».
languages.original_text: "I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: «Daré la orden de reparar a su nieta, pero, si quiere estar con ella para siempre, usted también tendrá que someterse a la Servidumbre Imperpituis».

languages.text: 「お前の孫娘を修理するよう命じよう。だが、彼女とずっと共にいたいのなら、お前も不眠奉仕の刑に処されることになる」
languages.original_text: "I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の孫娘を修理するよう命じよう。だが、彼女とずっと共にいたいのなら、お前も不眠奉仕の刑に処されることになる」

languages.text: « Je vais donner l'ordre de réparer votre petite-fille, mais si vous souhaitez rester à ses côtés jusqu'à la fin de vos jours, vous serez vous aussi soumis à la Servitude Imperpituis. »
languages.original_text: "I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais donner l'ordre de réparer votre petite-fille, mais si vous souhaitez rester à ses côtés jusqu'à la fin de vos jours, vous serez vous aussi soumis à la Servitude Imperpituis. »

languages.text: "Ich werde den Befehl erteilen, dass Eure Enkelin repariert wird, aber wenn Ihr für immer mit ihr zusammen sein wollt, müsst Ihr Euch auch der Servitut Imperpituis unterziehen."
languages.original_text: "I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde den Befehl erteilen, dass Eure Enkelin repariert wird, aber wenn Ihr für immer mit ihr zusammen sein wollt, müsst Ihr Euch auch der Servitut Imperpituis unterziehen."

languages.text: "Torununun tamir edilmesini emredeceğim fakat ondan ayrılmak istemiyorsan sen de Müebbet Hizmet'e mahkûm edileceksin."
languages.original_text: "I will give the order for your granddaughter to be repaired, but if you wish to be with her forever, you will also be subject to Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: "Torununun tamir edilmesini emredeceğim fakat ondan ayrılmak istemiyorsan sen de Müebbet Hizmet'e mahkûm edileceksin."
